name: Death
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: all those of the creature who summoned it

traits.name: The Law of Death
traits.desc: At the start of each of Death’s turns, undead within 10 feet of it take 10 force damage.

traits.name: Chaos Vulnerability
traits.desc: The Inexorables have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells.

traits.name: Inexorable
traits.desc: The Inexorables are immune to any effects that would slow them or deny them actions or movement.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Death’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * 3/day: death ward

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Death makes three slam attacks or makes one slam attack and one Death to Undeath attack.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Death to Undeath
actions.desc: Death points at an undead creature within 60 feet. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (6d10) force damage. On a successful save, the target takes half that damage.
